pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate the Care Density or Fragmented Care Density Given a Patient-Sharing Network // Given a patient-sharing network, calculate either the classic care density as proposed by Pollack et al. (2013) doi:10.1007/s11606-012-2104-7 or the fragmented care density as proposed by Engels et al. (2024) doi:10.1186/s12874-023-02106-0. By utilizing the 'igraph' and 'data.table' packages, the provided functions scale well for very large graphs.
